_components._string: Hitachi has been developing a new automation system, the autonomous mobile dual-arm robot. Control the robot in the warehouse and pick as many products as you can in 45secs.
_components._N$string: Hitachi has been developing a new automation system, the autonomous mobile dual-arm robot. Control the robot in the warehouse and pick as many products as you can in 45secs.

_components._string: Pick as many products as you can in 45secs. The logistics cockpit system will display the products that you need to pick. Tap the product to trigger the Dual-Arm Robot to pick it. Keep going until the 45secs is up!
_components._N$string: Pick as many products as you can in 45secs. The logistics cockpit system will display the products that you need to pick. Tap the product to trigger the Dual-Arm Robot to pick it. Keep going until the 45secs is up!
